name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Quests and Contracts
summary: Have you been dying to get a splendid new hat for your favourite hero? Or how about that axe that you just never seem to roll for? Well, the wait is finally over! In this new FREE DLC for Vermintide we are introducing a means for you to get the loot of your dreams. All you have to do is complete the objectives and collect your reward.
